languages.text: Наносит 100% бонусного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 100% целям, на которых действует эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}. Успешные атаки также накладывают эффект "жидкое пламя".
languages.original_text: Deals 100% bonus {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to targets with the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect. Successful attacks also inflict liquid flames.

traits.locale_text: Наносит 100% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусного{/g} урона с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 100% целям, на которых действует {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g}. Успешные атаки также накладывают эффект "жидкое пламя".

Deals 100% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to targets with the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect. Successful attacks also inflict liquid flames.

languages.text: Inflige 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional con 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} a los objetivos con el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}. Los impactos también infligen llamas líquidas.
languages.original_text: Deals 100% bonus {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to targets with the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect. Successful attacks also inflict liquid flames.

traits.locale_text: Inflige 100 % de daño {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}adicional{/g} con 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} a los objetivos con el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}. Los impactos también infligen llamas líquidas.

languages.text: 攻击时，如果目标受{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}效果影响，则此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高100%，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%。此外，还会对目标施加“液态火焰”效果。
languages.original_text: Deals 100% bonus {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to targets with the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect. Successful attacks also inflict liquid flames.

traits.locale_text: 攻击时，如果目标受{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}影响，则此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高100%，造成的伤害提高100%。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}此外，还会对目标施加“液态火焰”效果。

攻击时，如果目标受{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}影响，则此次攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}提高100%，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%。此外，还会对目标施加“液态火焰”效果。

languages.text: 100%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}で100%のボーナス{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}}効果の敵に与える。成功した攻撃は液体フレームも負わせる。
languages.original_text: Deals 100% bonus {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to targets with the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect. Successful attacks also inflict liquid flames.

traits.locale_text: 100%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}で100%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}ダメージを{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}の敵に与える。成功した攻撃は液体フレームも負わせる。

100%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}で100%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}の敵に与える。成功した攻撃は液体フレームも負わせる。

languages.text: Verursacht bei Zielen mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-Effekt 100 % Bonus-{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} mit 100 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}. Erfolgreiche Angriffe bewirken ferner "Flüssige Flammen".
languages.original_text: Deals 100% bonus {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to targets with the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect. Successful attacks also inflict liquid flames.

traits.locale_text: Fügt 100 % {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Zusatzschaden{/g} mit 100 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} zu, und zwar Zielen mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}. Erfolgreiche Angriffe fügen außerdem flüssige Flammen zu.

languages.text: Inflige un bonus de 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} aux cibles bénéficiant de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}. Les attaques réussies infligent également Flammes liquides.
languages.original_text: Deals 100% bonus {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with 100% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} to targets with the {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} effect. Successful attacks also inflict liquid flames.

traits.locale_text: Inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de 100 % de dégâts et 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} aux cibles bénéficiant de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}. Les attaques réussies infligent également Flammes Liquides.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Yanma{/g} etkisindeki hedeflere karşı %100 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değeriyle %100 bonus {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Başarılı saldırılar, ayrıca sıvı alevler oluşturur.
